Title: Havoc in Heaven
Writer: Wan Laiming (screenplay), Li Kuero (screenplay), Cheng'en Wu (novel)
Actors: Yue-Feng Qiu, Run-Sheng Fu, Hans Alfredson, Ke Bi
Plot: Da Nao Tian Gong is a Chinese animated feature film directed by Wan Laiming and produced by all four of the Wan brothers. The film was created at the height of the Chinese animation industry in the 1960s, and received numerous awards.--from WIKI.
